name: add_zero

text.english: \(Z\) is the identity element of \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, Z) = n \]
text.italiano: \(Z\) è l'elemento neutro di \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, Z) = n \]

coq:
Theorem add_zero: forall n : nterm , add n Z = n.
Proof.
Admitted.
